Description.Text: Go Native Regents Park is perfectly located in the centre of London, the property offers a choice of 56 studios, all fitted with modern appliances and furniture. All studios have their own individual character and basic kitchenette facilities with one fully fitted kitchen on each floor. The property is serviced with a lift to all floors, free on site laundry and ice machines around the building. There is also a guest lounge with fully fitted kitchen and a relaxed seating area around a 42'' plasma screen and a pool table for you to enjoy. Go Native City Regents Park offers beautifully appointed studio apartments delivering space and a stylish urban design. These have a basic kitchenette, comfortable living area and modern bathrooms complete with white company toiletries. There is one full kitchen on each floor.

In a quiet street just off Great Portland Street, Go Native Regends Parkis in the heart of London's zone 1, within a 5 minute walk of Oxford Street and the tube stations at Great Portland Street, Regents Park and Warren Street, giving you access to at least 6 tube lines. Perfect for travelling in and around London, the nightlife and culture of Marylebone Village, Soho and the West End are close at hand. The location puts everything London has to offer on your doorstep, from the tranquillity of Regents Park to the bustling streets of the West End and the hustle of the city.

3-Star Apartment - 3-Star Apartment offers one double bed with basic room amenities. 1 Bedroom Apartment.
Classic Studio Apartment - Each beautifully appointed studio apartment delivers space and a stylish urban design. These have a basic kitchenette, comfortable living area and modern bathrooms complete with white company toiletries. There is one full kitchen on each floor.
Premium Studio Apartment - Our Premium Studio Apartments deliver extra space and a modern stylish urban design. These have a basic kitchenette, comfortable living area and modern bathrooms complete with white company toiletries. There is one full kitchen on each floor.
